itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the craziest bet of all time on mybooki.com: the Over/Under of how many people will die this year from the Coronavirus.  They also discuss if the odds on the Olympic Games in Japan 2020 will be postponed, where Phi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the craziest bet of all time on mybooki.com: the Over/Under of how many people will die this year from the Coronavirus.  They also discuss if the odds on the Olympic Games in Japan 2020 will be postponed, where Phillip Rivers and Tom Brady will land, Deontay Wilder exercising his option for a rematch against Tyson Fury, and Ross' bold prediction that the Big Ten will get 10 teams into the tournament this year in college hoops.

mybookie.com

promo code: drinkinbros
